p: Significant 3D similarity was found between the SARS-CoV-2 and the HCV protease ( p = 1.34 × 10 −4) as well as between the SARS-CoV-2 protease and α-thrombin ( p = 7.42 × 10 −4). Interestingly, the protein parts with increased structural alignment included the catalytic area of the enzyme. The lowest similarity was observed in the case of angiotensin-converting enzyme and coagulation Factor Xa ( Figure 1 and Figure 2).
